name: NSLocale.Key
desc: The keys used to access components of a locale.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new locale key.

items.name: static let identifier: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The locale identifier.

items.name: static let countryCode: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The locale country or region code.

items.name: static let languageCode: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The locale language code.

items.name: static let scriptCode: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The locale script code.

items.name: static let variantCode: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The locale variant code.

items.name: static let exemplarCharacterSet: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The exemplar character set for the locale.

items.name: static let calendar: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The calendar associated with the locale.

items.name: static let collationIdentifier: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The collation associated with the locale.

items.name: static let collatorIdentifier: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The collation identifier for the locale.

items.name: static let usesMetricSystem: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: A flag that indicates whether the locale uses the metric system.

items.name: static let measurementSystem: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The measurement system associated with the locale.

items.name: static let decimalSeparator: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The decimal separator associated with the locale.

items.name: static let groupingSeparator: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The numeric grouping separator associated with the locale.

items.name: static let currencySymbol: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The currency symbol associated with the locale.

items.name: static let currencyCode: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The currency code associated with the locale.

items.name: static let quotationEndDelimiterKey: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The end quotation symbol associated with the locale.

items.name: static let quotationBeginDelimiterKey: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The begin quotation symbol associated with the locale.

items.name: static let alternateQuotationEndDelimiterKey: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The alternate end quotation symbol associated with the locale.

items.name: static let alternateQuotationBeginDelimiterKey: NSLocale.Key
items.desc: The alternating begin quotation symbol associated with the locale.
